name: TETRUX: Online
description: The classic of arcades has returned, and better than ever! Solo or with friends, in TETRUX: Online you can play in a wide variety of gamemodes.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2+ Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 250 MB available space
